PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-10082022-09-23,  ,  AAFC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Grain Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Grain Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA GRAIN REGULATIONS in order to (1) extend the time period over which a producer is able to trigger grain grading dispute resolution; (2) clarify that producers can dispute an elevator grade even if they were not able to deliver the grain themselves; (3) prescribe the time requirements for retaining a sample; and (4) allow for more flexible sample retention arrangements.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0195 Publication Date: 2022-10-12
AttachmentsAttachment
